name: Firelight Pact Maker
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Firelight" card. This card's level is treated as 4 in the hand whilst you have 2 "Firelight" monsters in your Pendulum Zones. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add "Firelight" monsters with different names from your face-up Extra Deck to your hand up to the number of "Firelight" monsters you control with different names. You can only use this effect of "Firelight Pact Maker" once per turn. If this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can destroy 1 "Firelight" card you control instead.
pendulum_text: "Firelight" monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each face-up Pendulum monster in your Extra Deck. During your Main Phase: You can Ritual Summon 1 Level 8 or lower "Firelight" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck, then destroy this card. You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Firelight" monsters. This effect cannot be negated.
